locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ one missed the mark bad. Parking is horrible and can be extremely tight. It‚Äôs not a good lay out at all. The showers are tiny. I‚Äôm a big guy but not that big. And there was mold all over the shower ceiling. Which is sad for something we ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ No pressure in the shower we were using and it leaked badly. ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ At least 2 showers here have black mold all over the corners of the ceiling and above the shower and even in some of the grout of the tile. ‚Ä¶

I give 3 stars because the store itself was clean with friendly staff and fresh grill items all day

The only issue was the shower room needs a deep cleaning and several fountain drinks had issues (but staff was fast to fix)
‚Ä¶ The showers are also tiny. The entire shower room felt like I was getting into a small closet. It also smelled terrible in the shower rooms and the floors weren't cleaned very well ‚Ä¶

Multiple showers down due to water pressure issues.  I get it it happens‚Ä¶.Shower attendant Unable to keep up with cleaning the few showers remaining in service. Unable to enter shower once finally cleaned and then attitude from shower ‚Ä¶

The shower was just dirty. The person made no effort to not even hide the fact that they didn‚Äôt clean it. I think they just went in put new towels and leave. Its not peak hours so there is no reason for it to be that disgusting ü§¢ at 2 AM ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ are nicely spaced and easy to get into. The showers are in desperate need of a remodel, black mold on the wall under the sink and there is a major leak situation going on in shower 3, I imagine the rest of the showers are in similar shape.

‚Ä¶ a hospitable environment. The shop's organization and stock levels are commendable. The availability of shower and laundry services adds to the convenience. It would be appreciated if the food options included local cuisine to offer ‚Ä¶
As a professional truck driver, after a long day showers are essential, after coming here to take a shower the water was freezing cold!!

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This was THE worst road shower I've ever had that I had to pay for. There are no curtains, so you have nowhere dry to put your feet when you step out. Literally. The temperature and pressure of the water are one. If you want a hot or warm ‚Ä¶

Stop by on Long haul for a quick shower and I was to say the least very displeased nastiest shower room I've ever been in. Not to mention needed tire changed and it took over 4 hours for what was quoted 1.5 hour wait. No one seems to work ‚Ä¶

We love FJ most Truckers do. But if you have this kind of shower service your gonna lose many drivers out there. The manager should pay more attention to his co-employees. The shower room that we had was nasty, really nasty. Sorry for the ‚Ä¶
Not trying to get anyone in trouble but the filthiest showers I've seen at a pilot. Invest in a pressure washer. It's expensive to shower, keep it clean for those that pay please
Hire a second poor person who could clean the showers, reduce the shower queue. First time I've seen my place in line through the app with to not decrease, but increase
12 people are waiting in line to take a shower. Six shower doors are open, but no one is cleaning them. People are just sitting and waiting.

This is unbelievable waiting 1 hour for a shower  all the shower empty but their only maintenance guy and he is doing something else and 20 people waiting‚Ä¶ mind you 3 personal in the front refusing to clean the showers‚Ä¶
Large lot, but hard to find a spot. Enough space to alley dock, though. Very long line for shower, but it is moving fast. Water is norminal.
‚Ä¶ Also, a couple of times I came here, I had to shift fuel lanes because the driver was parked at the pump while in taking a shower because they had no place else to park. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ they had one man cleaning! He was so busy with the showers that he couldn‚Äôt get to the trash outside which was toppling over the garbage bin and many bags were all over the ground because it was too full. I took 2 showers while staying ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: A decent amount of free parking and shower 18 has perfect water pressure and the people are basically friendly and the food is standard but I always walk over to the Chinese restaurant on the other side of Love's and always have great food ‚Ä¶

Went in for a shower. Shower#7 5/13@ 0915. hair in the shower, nasty gunk stuck to the sink bowl, crap stains in the toilet and on the seat. I left, wasting a shower credit, and won't be back. Not expecting spotless, but do expect it to not ‚Ä¶
Fixtures in showers are falling apart. Mold around toilets and shower floors. Cold showers. Half the diesel pumps are in operable.
One the best truck stops that I used. A plenty of spots, very clean store and facilities, clean shower, laundry and restrooms. And friendly staff!
Some good, some bad. The worst part of my experience was that my shower room had a wider variety of hairs in it than a hippie drum circle.

It's a nice big parking lot with lots of reserved parking.  I took a shower they had great water pressure.  I had some problems with my soap dispenser,  apparently I wasn't pushing hard enough? Over all a good stop.
‚Ä¶ The man and woman attending to the shower area were beyond amazing and so sweet. ‚Ä¶
I had just gone here to grab a shower. Oh my gosh the shower was very clean and the water pressure was amazing. The only employee I saw was a guy at the register. He was nice. Great job.

‚Ä¶ We also took a shower, and it was extremely clean! The floors seemed to be freshly mopped, and you could smell the cleaning products. The towels were even still warm from being freshly laundered. ‚Ä¶

Great truck stop!  Showers were plentiful and clean. Shower attendant was very friendly. There is a barber and game room in addition to the normal amenities. Most appreciative of the US Mail box! Lots of truck parking but it fills up ‚Ä¶

locations.title: I-81 Carlisle Truck Stop
locations.content: I-81 Carlisle Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: The showers are amazing!!! Great pressure!! Very clean!! Needed a good shower bc our water pump broke. We were hestitant to use a truck stop. However, I would use it again!!!
Don't have anything but fuel, toilet, shower and indian carryout which is very good I might add

showerReviews.reviewText: If this is the rest stop for trucks AND CARS, after the Newville exit restroom is  clean and nice open areas for pets and for humans to walk in.  Grass is kept mowed nicely.
Very clean for a rest stop. The employees were helpful, and the prices reasonable. Thanks so much! Stops like this made my trip that much more enjoyable!!

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Pilot Corp can you explain the red light that caught my attention in the shower ? When you turn off the lights
This has been shared
A Quiet Place.  Has a Big space to back into a parking spot.   Shower 5  upside down installed hanger but maybe this way may help avoid people used it overwight.

Two days to clean up after the 12/16/2020 snow storm and this place is an ice rink.

Plus lay off the damn water softener Pilot's!  It's like taking a slime shower.

‚Ä¶ otr driver for a little over five years, and I've never seen a pilot or flying j this bad. Btw that shower  towel wasn't mine so that only tells me whomever cleaned this didn't even walk in there much less disinfect anything. Never again.
Just finished taking a shower at this location. It was definitely one of the cleanest shower facility that I have seen in a long time. Thanks to the staff for doing a great job.

Need to stop coming here. Had use points to buy a shower, and then when I got in I had to clean someone else's waste off the seat. They wouldn't refund my points afterwards. That's 17 bucks down the drain. ‚Ä¶

Pulled in here yesterday and everything was great. Shower's clean, subway was quick and cashiers up front friendly. Go in this morning for breakfast before pulling out and left without buying anything. You have one person working the subway ‚Ä¶
Had to wait over half an hour for the shower cleaning guy to have a break. Now I know he deserves a break, but can't someone else clean them then? ‚Ä¶

12 people waiting for a shower and one hippy cleaning!  Two showers dirty and hippy says, I‚Äôll clean‚Äôem when I get to them!  Did I mention 12 truckers waiting for a shower! Hippy nor the dude behind the counter care! As many people shower ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ want to hear it, nor should I. The store is well stocked but floors and bathrooms could stand to be cleaned. As for the note and candy in the shower, we are not all guys out here, so addressing the note to just the guys, cost you a tip.

locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Needs to be updated but overall, not a bad place to stop.. Showers are small and no place to put your bag unless you put it on the floor. I don't like to do that. You may not mind.. Showers are decent with hot water. Water pressure could be ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ smile! My order was perfect, and the meatloaf plate was awesome.  Quan was very courteous and professional, and my shower room was spotless! Jessie at the fuel desk was helpful and eager to solve my card problem (I know, right? When does ‚Ä¶

I'm always surprised to see amazing customer service from folks who don't owe me anything.  Thank you, Angelo, for being so kind to this dirty hiker and for helping me navigate shower and laundry.  What a restful and productive stop-over! G ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Other than that. Clean shower, clean store, really good restaurant, although limited hours. Acceptable amount of paid parking.

Good people plenty of selection of stuff but if you are in a hurry to take a shower forget about it. Every time I come here for one I wait 20 plus minutes. Not because they‚Äôre full but because of waiting for the day time worker to clean the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ was worth it. Lunch, not so much, 10 bucks for  tenders and fries that was clearly a child size portion.  The exterior needs a lil tlc (potholes and the wafting smell of urine) gave me pause but the restrooms and shower area was spotless.

Asked for a team shower and guy gave us one shower saying they big enough for 2! me  and my co driver are just that co drivers and then had the nerve to act mad some lady fixed it and the showers are clean but I hate how I'm already tired ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ full and it was and had to pay $14  for  reserved parking. Very clean shower, store is clean and organizes with your normal rape the trucker high truckstop prices. I treated myself to the Country Pride Restaurant and the buffet was good. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is dry as a bone, spaghetti has minimal sauce and also looks dry, just to list  a couple issues.  Grab my free shower and then walk over to the Flying J to eat at Perkins. Food at Perkins is fresh, staff is friendly, and prices  are great. ‚Ä¶

I must of got lucky had none of the problems that we're posted everything was clean parking lot was full but I got one of the last spots only waited 10 minutes for shower. All in all not to bad for being in this area. I try to avoid the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Not a bad spot to stop big truck parking nice people and decent food what more can you ask maybe a shower lol but overall 4‚≠êÔ∏è
Very friendly staff. Restaurant on site; truck scale, fuel and all necessities. Showers are similar to a camp ground but are free with the purchase of a shower. I will return on my next trip.

Nice staff
Clean shower &restroom

locations.title: Blue Mountain Travel Plaza
locations.content: Blue Mountain Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Stopped to gas up and use the restrooms. It was okay. A lot cleaner inside and outside than the other location along route 276 West. Ladies restroom wasn‚Äôt too bad. It was clean enough to actually use the toilet. It was early in the morning ‚Ä¶

We got there about 7pm. Auntie annes was shut dosn, sbarro shut down, bathrooms filthy, and only iptions were roy rogers that was out of alot of stuff and starbucks. 711 had aandwhiches but no way to heat them up.

These travel plazas provide one with just about anything one would need on a road trip. From gas to convenience store items, to fast foods, they have it all. One can either sit inside to enjoy one's meal, or outside. The bathrooms are ‚Ä¶

On the way to our vacation we took a short break in this service plaza. It is nice, clean and roomy. Not too crowded yet the 7-11 location could be little more spacious or should have been more organized to make more rooms for the visitors. ‚Ä¶
Lots of parking. Clean rest rooms. Decent array of fast food choices. Beware of typical inflated turnpike prices.
Small plaza but it offers food and snacks.  It has a Roy Rogers and a Starbucks.  The bathrooms were clean. Handicap push buttons for the entry and exit doors.
The main building has never been opened anytime i have stopped there.  Toilets are clean but basic

locations.showerReviewSummary: 7 shower-related reviews found. Generally Positive mentions of: restroom, clean, bathroom

locations.description: Set beside a service station, this low-key place prepares burgers, subs & pizza.

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Normally I prefer Loves over all other truck stops because they're clean and the staff is friendly.  However,  this location was a little different.  The showers were atrocious and it looked like there was black mold all along the ceiling.  I won't be back to this location at all...

recently stopped at this Love‚Äôs Travel Stop, and I was extremely disappointed. The overall cleanliness of the location is unacceptable for a professional truck stop. The floors and parking area are full of trash, and people throw garbage ‚Ä¶
Def been to cleaner and nicer loves. But it gets the job done. First time noticing a mini casino in these!!

This definitely shouldn't be 5 stars the Wendy's was great the staff was friendly also the staff in the loves was as well but the men's restroom was i swear a negative 5 stars every stall had trash around the toilets the toilets themselves ‚Ä¶

I‚Äôm a fan of loves. But this one missed the mark bad. Parking is horrible and can be extremely tight. It‚Äôs not a good lay out at all. The showers are tiny. I‚Äôm a big guy but not that big. And there was mold all over the shower ceiling. ‚Ä¶

locations.content: PA Turnpike Cumberland Valley Service Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Clean, easy to park. Good selection of food and drink vendors, including a 7-Eleven. ‚Ä¶

Bathrooms were not working and every bathroom stall was filled like a porta potty.  Staff didn‚Äôt seem to have the urgency to repair the issue. I ended up using a small bathroom designated for family. Other than that issue it was the usual ‚Ä¶
When traveling, clean bathrooms are a must. I don't recall seeing a dirty, unkempt restroom on the PA Turnpike. This rest stop is no exception. ‚Ä¶
We usually stop here to use the restrooms which are kept clean and well stocked. It is a good place to get that cup of coffee for the halfway point, and snacks to tie us over until we get there.

A great place for RV's to take a brake
Two areas for trucks.  Clean restrooms, fast food, information ,and grass to walk dogs.
Clean rest rooms, and a good selection of things to eat in the Food Court . Convenient in and out access from the highway.

locations.title: 83 Travel Plaza
locations.content: 83 Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Truckers and patrons should try this place good food decent price trucker free parking with purchase of food and times they have showers and laundry very clean bathrooms clean ‚Ä¶

Great diner.  Great pizza place as well.  Pay to park for Semis or eat inside and that will cover the parking.  Showers and Laundry available as well.  Also, they do check at night to see if you paid!

I loved my stop here so much, all kinds of food...here in travel center and in diner next door. Prices are great and affordable...showers are clean and the have washer and dryers available, a ATM machine as well. Your shower purchase goes ‚Ä¶

The staff working this evening is very helpful. Paid parking but free with purchases. We ordered a large Hawaiian pizza and it was delicious.  Clean restrooms and showers. Definitely recommend this place to anyone in the area needing food, parking, and or shower.

I did not try there food, but did need to grab a quick shower before heading towards the west coast.  I'm pretty sure there are substances on the shower floor unknown to modern science!  I mean good grief if the showers are any indication of how clean there food prep area is well make your own decisions.
